name: Blobby Bobby in The Land Of Slimes
name_original: Blobby Bobby in The Land Of Slimes
description:
Bobby the Blob is on a mission.  A mission of slimes.  Slimes.

Made for the Brackeys 2023.1 game jam with the theme "An End is a New Beginning".

Coding and Animation - Cybernik12 and Brynimation

Music - Conor James

(Bryn - https://www.linkedin.com/in/bryn-llewelyn-jones-39963aa2/,

Nik - https://www.linkedin.com/in/nikolas-synodinos-2ba091233/,

Conor - https://www.youtube.com/@ConorJames)
